message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm willing to let it go for $9,500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I'm confident in the value of my product, I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still believe I can find the product at a lower price. I am willing to pay $8,750 for the product.
